creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Amy Kasai
description: large grey converging column at center surrounded by grey-blue background with incised scalloping lines at either side; vertical strip of yellow at R, vertical strip of red at L; four vertical purple forms across lower center overlapping lighter purple ovals with darker purple centers; small green mark at lower center between two of the dark purple forms; two somewhat oval blue outlines enter scene at an angle at top center; blue nearly circular form at tip of one oval outline at UR; overlapping gray forms at upper center
signed: bottom margin, in pencil: [To North by \"F\" Rikio Takahashi 1971]
title: To North by "F"
